name: Bricks (DieterDerVermieter)
description:
Simple brick arcade game. Shoot balls to destroy the incoming bricks. Don't let the bricks reach you.

Select the ball you want to shoot with. Aim with your mouse to fire the balls. While the balls are flying, click to spawn a force field, that attracts balls.

GitHub: https://github.com/DieterDerVermieter/AlienBricks.git
